ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.network

Class DrawingProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.network.DrawingProtocol

  • public class DrawingProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing device-to-device communication using NearbyConnection. This class defines a standard set of messages accepted by this connection, as well as callbacks and DrawingLayer integration for propagating changes between devices.

      • DrawingProtocol

        public DrawingProtocol(Activity activity,
                       DrawingModel model)
        Create a drawing protocol to provide syncing with the given model.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity to use for dialogs
        model - the model to sync

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • isLocationEnabled

        private boolean isLocationEnabled()
        Check that location is enabled. Required for Nearby Connections
        Returns:
        whether location is enabled

      • host

        public void host()
        Start hosting this canvas, allowing for others to connect and collaborate. Starts network advertising.

      • join

        public void join()
        Join a hosted canvas. Starts network discovery.

      • startCommunication

        private void startCommunication(int waitingMessageId,
                                int titleId,
                                int cancelId)
        Initialize connection callbacks and start protocol execution.
        Parameters:
        waitingMessageId - the message to show while waiting for the other device
        titleId - the title of the dialog
        cancelId - the message to show on the snackbar when waiting is cancelled

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect from any remote clients. Also stops advertising and discovery

      • disconnect

        private void disconnect(boolean wasMessage)
        Disconnect from any remote clients. Also stops advertising and discovery
        Parameters:
        wasMessage - whether this is being called by the user or a network message

      • setupMessageHandler

        private void setupMessageHandler()
        Set the connection callback to a handler defining the protocol to follow.

      • synchronizeCanvases

        public void synchronizeCanvases()
                         throws JSONException
        Perform a synchronization between this canvas and a remote canvas.
        Throws:
        JSONException - JSON was invalid in a message

      • syncComplete

        private void syncComplete()
                   throws JSONException
        Synchronization finished. Acknowledge if we are the host. Will set up model drawing layer with a NetworkedDrawingLayer to facilitate future updates.
        Throws:
        JSONException - JSON was invalid

      • syncHost

        private void syncHost(JSONObject data)
               throws JSONException
        Called when this connection is not the host. Responds to complete the sync.
        Parameters:
        data - the message containing the host's canvas
        Throws:
        JSONException - JSON was invalid

      • syncForeign

        private void syncForeign(JSONObject data)
                  throws JSONException
        Called when this connection is the host. Responds by sending the host's canvas.
        Parameters:
        data - the message containing the remote's canvas
        Throws:
        JSONException - JSON was invalid

      • syncStart

        private void syncStart()
                throws JSONException
        Called on the remote. Host acknowledges it is ready to sync. Respond by sending remote's canvas.
        Throws:
        JSONException - JSON was invalid

      • performChange

        private void performChange(JSONObject data)
                    throws JSONException
        Request was received to update our copy of the remote canvas. Unpack and update the layer
        Parameters:
        data - JSON containing the changes
        Throws:
        JSONException - JSON was invalid

      • createNetworkAction

        public void createNetworkAction(java.lang.String action,
                                JSONArray value)
        Local drawing layer was updated. Send message to the other device to have it update.
        Parameters:
        action - the change that occurred
        value - data about the change
